message_1: What is the result of applying the SHA-256 (Secure Hash Algorithm-256) cryptographic hash function to the message "Hello, World!"?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello, World!", you can use various programming languages or online tools. Here's the resulting hash:

`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`

Keep in mind that even a small change in the input message will result in a completely different hash.
